description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. All the Bad Parts is an Action Adventure that features hand to hand combat, weapons, a shifting plot line, and multiple endings. The story begins in a classroom.  While trying to survive school, Corbin starts to notice that time is starting to speed up, and everything isn’t as it appears.  He then has to make sense of the shifting world around him, fight waves of enemies, and make key decisions.
